00046 static inline int ctk_usleep(unsigned long usec) {
00047     ctk_uint32_t init, current;
00048     ctk_uint32_t oldmask;
00049     ctk_uint32_t tb_sleep_count = (ctk_uint32_t)
00050            (usec * ((float)ctk_timebase_clock * 1.0e-6));
00051 
00052     if (!ctk_do_profiling)
00053         spu_writech(SPU_WrDec, INT_MAX);
00054 
00055     init = spu_readch(SPU_RdDec);
00056     oldmask = ctk_event_set_mask(MFC_DECREMENTER_EVENT);
00057     while (1) {
00058         if (spu_readchcnt(SPU_RdEventStat)) {
00059             unsigned int tmp = spu_readch(SPU_RdEventStat);
00060             spu_writech(SPU_WrEventAck, tmp);
00061             spu_writech(SPU_WrDec, UINT_MAX);
00062         }
00063         current = spu_readch(SPU_RdDec);
00064         if (init - current > tb_sleep_count)
00065             break;
00066         if (current <= 0) {
00067             tb_sleep_count -= (init - current);
00068             spu_writech(SPU_WrDec, UINT_MAX);
00069         }
00070     }
00071     ctk_event_set_mask(oldmask);
00072     return 0;
00073 }
00074 
00081 static inline int ctk_sleep(unsigned long sec) {
00082     unsigned long i;
00083     for (i = 0; i < sec; i++)
00084         ctk_usleep(1000 * 1000);
00085     return 0;
00086 }

00088 static signed __ctk_rand_seed = 1;
00089 
00093 static inline void ctk_srand(signed int s)
00094 {
00095     __ctk_rand_seed = s;
00096 }
00097 
00101 static inline signed int ctk_rand()
00102 {
00103     __ctk_rand_seed = __ctk_rand_seed * 69621;
00104     return (__ctk_rand_seed & 2147483647);
00105 }
00106 
00110 #define ctk_init_rand()     ctk_srand(spu_readch(SPU_RdDec))

00120 ctk_write_barrier(int tag) {

00167 static inline int ctk_nlz(unsigned int x) __attribute__((always_inline));
00168 static inline int ctk_nlz(unsigned int x)
00169 {
00170     return spu_extract(spu_cntlz(spu_splats(x)), 0);
00171 }
00172 
00176 static inline int ctk_nlz64(unsigned long long x) __attribute__((always_inline));
00177 static inline int ctk_nlz64(unsigned long long x)
00178 {
00179     vec_uint4 clz = spu_cntlz((vec_uint4)spu_splats(x));
00180     vec_uint4 mask = spu_cmpeq(clz, 32U);
00181     return spu_extract(clz, 0) + 
00182            spu_extract(spu_sel(clz, spu_splats(0U), mask), 1);
00183 }
00184 
00188 static inline int ctk_nlo(unsigned int x)
00189 {
00190     return ctk_nlz(~x);
00191 }
00192 
00196 static inline int ctk_nlo64(unsigned long long x)
00197 {
00198     return ctk_nlz64(~x);
00199 }
